mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications (user_id, type, title, content, action_url, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{actionUrl}, #{isRead}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false
mapper.update: UPDATE notifications SET is_read = true, read_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notifications WHERE created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
